price: Esse é O Sabedor do invisível e do visível, O Todo-Poderoso, O Misericordiador,
arabic: ذَٰلِكَ عَٰلِمُ ٱلۡغَيۡبِ وَٱلشَّهَٰدَةِ ٱلۡعَزِيزُ ٱلرَّحِيمُ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: dhālika ʿālimu al-ghaybi wal-shahādati al-ʿazīzu al-raḥīmu
